Description:
Modern Family Perfection with Every Indulgence
Intelligently designed, beautifully appointed & bathed in natural light, this as-new residence 4 bedroom delivers a family lifestyle beyond compare along with quick & easy access to the best of Highlands.
High square-set ceilings throughout, the home's vogue interior comprises an extra-large master bedroom with fitted walk-in robe & luxurious ensuite with double vanity & double shower, together with 3 additional bedrooms (built-in robes) & stylish main bathroom.
Complementing the vast & versatile open-plan living/dining area is a gourmet kitchen with
stone benchtops & splashbacks, dishwasher, 900mm cooking appliances & adjoining butler's pantry.
Other first-class features include zoned ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, alarm & video intercom, large laundry with ample cupboard space, on-trend black fittings, soft-close cabinetry & double blinds throughout. Stacker doors reveal an al-fresco entertaining area & neat gardens all-round, plus the added advantage of a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Close proximity to Craigieburn's growing array of primary & secondary schools, popular parks & shopping centres along with easy access to Mickleham Road & the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 102 Highlander Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Impressive Parcel of Land
An opportunity not to be missed with this prime 494m2 (approx.) flat block of land on offer to you.
This block is close proximity to transport, schools and Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
With everything Craigieburn has to offer already, future planning is in place for more amenities such as schools, shops and facilities.
Surrounded by beautiful parklands and an amazing family friendly community this is definitely a place you would feel proud to call home.

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers and investors alike. Offering 3 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, main bathroom, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, open plan meals area with adjoining family room.
A host of extras include ducted heating & split system cooling, single lock up garage with remote control entry and internal access, backyard perfect for entertaining and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates (Aston) & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.
If you are looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go. Just a few of the features on hand include kitchen with adjoining meals area and lounge, heating & cooling, formal lounge room, master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, well equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliance and dishwasher, double garage, and much more. Whatever your requirements may be, this property offers endless opportunities. Ideally located right in the heart of Craigieburn and within walking distance to the Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, schools and shops. Don't let this opportunity pass you by as a property like this won't come along often.

Description:
Great Potential on 650m2 Land!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 4 Pembroke Crescent Craigieburn. Positioned on a massive 650m2 block this home presents the perfect opportunity to secure a great family home. With a little bit of tender love and care needed, this home is ideal for those who like to get their hands dirty. This fantastic home presents a sizeable master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, two further bedrooms with built in robes, additional study or fourth bedroom serviced by a central bathroom, massive L-shaped formal lounge and formal dining area with cathedral ceilings, spacious kitchen which overlooks the dining and family area. Outside you can enjoy the spacious pergola area which can also be used as extra storage for cars, boats and trailers with the drive through garage. Fantastic extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, garden shed and more. Perfectly located with public transport, schools and shops all a short distance away, add this to your inspection list and see the potential.

Description:
Impeccable Family Living on a Big Fairways Block
In a popular Fairways neighbourhood renowned for its quality homes & impressive family
amenities, this single-level home occupies an exceptionally wide allotment providing a pristine environment of indoor style, outdoor space & terrific Craigieburn convenience.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's light-filled interior comprises a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes), spotless central bathroom & separate WC.
Add to this a formal lounge & dining leading through to the versatile open-plan living/meals
area & accompanying kitchen with breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, gas cooktop & ample
cupboard space, plus ducted heating & split-system air conditioning, large laundry & oversized double garage.
Step outside to appreciate with sheer size of the backyard providing plenty of scope to
landscape, extend, create a sensational al-fresco entertaining area or install a pool - or all of the above!
Walking distance to Fairways' renowned parks & local buses (on Fairways Boulevard), it also
offers easy access to the area's popular shopping centres, childcare & kindergarten facilities, as well as a range of primary & secondary schools.
Insights: 7 Waterdale Rise, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Right in the heart of Craigieburn!
This modern 2 bedroom townhouse won't last long! This home has NO body corporate. With its prime location & everything at your doorstep! Craigieburn Central Shopping & Restaurant precinct, Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre, Schools & public transport all within minutes walking distance!
Only 7 years young!
Great for first home buyers, first time investors, add to your portfolio or anyone wishing to downsize with very little garden maintenance!
Downstairs:-
High 2.7 foot ceilings.
Separate Lounge Room.
Hard wood timber flooring throughout the first floor.
Good size laundry & separate Powder room.
Modern kitchen with stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances; dishwasher, gas cook top, electric oven and robin hood with ample cupboard space & pantry.
Kitchen overlooking the meals/dining area and 2nd living area/lounge room with a glass sliding door taking you outside to the courtyard & garage.
Other highlights;
Under staircase storage
Downlights throughout
Security doors
Flyscreens throughout
Split system - hot/cold
Holland blinds
Smoke Alarms
Garage with Remote control
Upstairs:
Two very large bedrooms share the top floor, all carpeted with built in robes & wall panel heating.
The central bathroom consists of a shower, bath & vanity. Separate toilet, linen cupboard and study/nook area that has natural light filled due to skylight.
This property certainly represents a perfect addition to your investment portfolio or starting out in the rental world!
This first time on the market townhouse won't last long! Be quick to avoid disappointment!
Schools
Aitken Creek Primary School 1.7km
Mt Ridley College 1.9km
Willmott Park Primary School 2.1km
Craigieburn Central 1.6km
Splash Aqua Park 1.5km

** SOCIAL DISTANCING REGULATIONS AND CONDITIONS APPLY! **

Description:
An Extra Large Family Home on 650m2*
Absolutely perfect for larger/extended families, this one-of-a-kind home stands out from the crowd with its exceptional floorplan flexibility, impressive land size & unbeatable convenience in the very heart of Craigieburn.
Eminently versatile, the home's spotless interior comprises 3 downstairs bedrooms, dedicated study & 3 updated bathrooms, along with a spacious lounge, kitchen/dining area & rear living room. Add to this a further 2 upstairs bedrooms, additional bathroom, living/meals area & second kitchen, as well as its own private entrance.
Other stand-out features include heating & cooling, solid timber floors, large laundry & excellent storage options, plus an outdoor al-fresco style entertaining area, substantial backyard, double garage via side driveway & additional front off-street parking space.
Walking distance to local parks & Cimberwood Drive buses, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails, choice of shopping centres, primary & secondary schools, as well as easy access to Craigieburn Station & the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 38 Bank Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Class, Convenience & Parkland Proximity
Tucked away in a quiet one-way street yet moments from the buzz of Craigieburn Central, this double story townhouse provides a modern oasis of quality and class with its well-proportioned rooms, impressive inclusions and profusion of natural light throughout. Impeccable from start to finish, the home's interior comprises three genuinely oversized bedrooms (master with BIR) along with a deluxe ensuite and equally-stylish main bathroom. The spacious and versatile kitchen/dining area is complemented by an with a sleek kitchen complete with ample cupboard space & stainless steel appliances. Other stand-out features include large formal lounge, evaporative cooling & ducted heating, double remote control garage, roomy laundry and additional powder room (third WC). Immediate access to a choice of bus routes, Splash Leisure Centre & Anzac Park's renowned
recreational facilities, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails along with a choice of popular primary & secondary schools. Outstanding modern living!

Description:
Contact Craig Frost on 0413 018 033 for a PRIVATE INSPECTION.
This meticulously maintained and beautifully presented five-bedroom Burbank home (2016), enjoys three living areas and fully landscaped surrounds, making living easy on 448sqm approx. With a flexible floorplan and a generous amount of space, this property is likely to suit a wide range of buyers for a family home that will change with their needs over the years to come.
Welcome inside to a wide tiled hallway that leads from the front formal living room, past the main bedroom with WIR and ensuite, to the exceptionally generous open family living zone which includes two additional living areas, kitchen and dining offering sliding door access to the rear yard.
The butler style kitchen is conveniently located close to the laundry and includes caesar stone benchtops, a brand new 900mm stainless steel electric stove and oven, breakfast servery and walk-in butler pantry.
The rear yard is a balance of synthetic grass and timber decking leading to the serviceable side of the house with clothes line and garage passage door access.
Additional features include; security monitor camera system, security doors, ducted heating, two split systems to living rooms, freshly painted, new carpets, built-in robes to four bedrooms and located close to schools, shopping precincts and public transport.
A note to buyers
We base our price ranges on comparable sales within the area and current market conditions. We do not over quote property to vendors or underquote property to buyers. We recognise that the final sale price will ultimately be influenced by competition within the market and that the advertised selling range is not a ceiling to the price buyers may be willing to pay to secure the purchase of the property.
Frost Real Estate is pleased to be able to offer our buyers complete dedication to your discrete purchasing experience. Every interested buyer is invited to put their best offer forward for the property with the knowledge that offers will not be disclosed between buyers. At the heart of Frost Real Estate is a passion for helping people enjoy the experience of purchasing and selling property. We hope that this information helps you with your property search.
While every effort has been made to provide the correct description of the property and identify the properties features, we advise you to conduct an inspection of the property for your own satisfaction. Please contact Craig Frost on 0413 018 033 for further information and to arrange a private inspection.
Insights: 15 Creekbridge Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

2. 4 bedrooms, 2 Living Areas, 2 bathrooms & double garage

4. Approx 2 kms to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre
5. Approx 4 kms to Craigieburn Train Station
6. Bus stop to Craigieburn train station at approx 500m walk
7. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria presents 29 Archipelago Drive, Craigieburn in the prestigious Mt Aitken estate & only a short drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre & schools. Photos are from previous similar property.
This brand new home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and much more.
29 Archipelago Drive Features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms, master will full double vanity ensuite and walk in robe remaining 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Well-equipped kitchen & stainless steel cooking appliances including 900 mm gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, walk in pantry and island bench.
- Open plan living space comprising spacious dining and living area adjacent kitchen.
- Formal Lounge
- Modern central bathroom.
- Spacious laundry
- Central ducted heating and provisions for evaporative cooling
- Concrete perimeter around the house and security alarm
- Remote control double car garage and much more!
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 now for further information or to arrange an inspection.
Photo ID must be presented upon all open & private inspections.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy on 684m2 (approximately)
You will be the envy of all your friends with this stylish family home. Offering a comfortable lifestyle of space and quality ideally located within close proximity to the train station, Hume Highway, local schools and shops. Just some of the features on hand include kitchen with stainless steel appliances, formal lounge, meals/family area, ducted heating split system cooling, study, master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite, double lock up garage, 5 kilowatt solar system, HUGE stunning decked alfresco area perfect for those who like to entertain all year round and much more. With multiple storage sheds/bungalow outside and all set on a very large allotment 684m2 (approximately) providing you with endless options as far as storage for the boat, caravan or trailer. This home really is the complete package. Don't let this opportunity pass you by. This one won't hang around for long. Call now for inspection

Description:
Perfect First Home or Impressive Investment
In a popular & whisper quiet Aston neighbourhood close to Craigieburn Central, Schools & public transport, this freestanding home presents a ready-to-enjoy environment of easy-living style with its generous design, substantial outdoor entertaining space, long list of features & abundance of natural light throughout.
Presenting an inviting interior comprising 3 double bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & stylish ensuite), sparkling main bathroom & open-plan living/dining area spilling out to a colossal decked area and private back garden, perfect for kids to play in complete privacy.
Other highlights include, a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, ample cupboard & stone bench space, deep pantry & dishwasher, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, roller shutters throughout, plus remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Tick all the boxes on your must-have wish list with this modern delight that is sure to excite all home buyers & investors alike.
